import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function Product(props){ return (

ref : {props.product.cmp}

name : {props.product.name}

categorie : {props.product.categorie}

prix : {product.prix}

quanity : {product.quanity}

dispatch({type:'delete',payload:{e:product}})}> Delete Update
) }
